The project will start with a virtual project alignment meeting with the key county leadership and staff to discuss the overall approach; review the initial workplan to support establishing strong working relationships; ensure clear communication, detailed schedules, timelines and milestones; and determine how best to foster engagement throughout the project. 

Omni will conduct a thorough review of background materials to ensure that the project is grounded in an understanding of the opioid issues facing Bedford County as well as other related existing community plans to ensure integration. A larger in-person project kickoff meeting that will include key partners will follow, where Omni staff will introduce the project team, present the workplan, and gather input from key partners across the opioid landscape in the County. In-person engagement is an important part of building trust, and this larger kickoff meeting will help establish the groundwork for ongoing collaboration and commitment from all partners.^[yet another footnote]

### Subtopic C

You can control the width of callout boxes and quote boxes thanks to the `fixed_width_px` argument:

```r
callout_box(
    text = "This is a callout box. You can <highlight>change text color to highlight certain parts</highlight>, or just leave the text all white. Change the background color as desired to match the page.",
    color = "orange-red-600",
    fixed_width_px = 600       # default value is 300
)
```

```{r}
callout_box(
    text = "This is a callout box. You can <highlight>change text color to highlight certain parts</highlight>, or just leave the text all white. Change the background color as desired to match the page.",
    color = "orange-red-600",
    fixed_width_px = 600
)
```

<br>
<br>

You can also use markdown content:

```r
callout_box(
    text = "This is a callout box. You can <highlight>change text color to highlight certain parts</highlight>, or just leave the text **all white**. Change the background color as desired to match the page.^[footnote example]",
    color = "olive-green-600",
    fixed_width_px = 600
)
```

- Default icon with text

```{r}
width_px <- 50 # default value
icon_color_fg <- "white"
icon_color_bg <- 'teal-600'

icon_text_grid(
    omni_icon('education', width_px, icon_color_bg, icon_color_fg),
    icon_text(
        text = '**71.9%:** Any person younger than 21 caught with or suspected of consuming alcohol or marijuana is charged with Minor in Possession (MIP).'
    ),
    omni_icon('security', width_px, icon_color_bg, icon_color_fg),
    icon_text(
        '**69.8%:** Adults in Colorado who knowingly hep someone younger than 18 break the law - which includes providing minors with alcohol or drubgs - can be charged with a Class 4 felony.'
    ),
    omni_icon('vault', width_px, icon_color_bg, icon_color_fg),
    icon_text(
        '**34.4%:** It is legal for a person ages 18-20 to possess marijuana with a medical marijuana card.'
    ),
    width_px = width_px
)
```

- Customized version

```{r}
width_px <- 40
text_width <- 700
icon_color_fg <- "white"
icon_color_bg <- 'teal-600'

icon_text_grid(
    omni_icon('education', width_px, icon_color_bg, icon_color_fg),
    icon_text(
        text = '**71.9%:** Any person younger than 21 caught with or suspected of consuming alcohol or marijuana is charged with Minor in Possession (MIP).',
        text_width
    ),
    omni_icon('security', width_px, icon_color_bg, icon_color_fg),
    icon_text(
        '**69.8%:** Adults in Colorado who knowingly hep someone younger than 18 break the law - which includes providing minors with alcohol or drubgs - can be charged with a Class 4 felony.',
        text_width
    ),
    omni_icon('vault', width_px, icon_color_bg, icon_color_fg),
    icon_text(
        '**34.4%:** It is legal for a person ages 18-20 to possess marijuana with a medical marijuana card.',
        text_width
    ),
    column_gap_px = 5, # default is 10
    row_gap_px = 5, # default is 10
    width_px = width_px
)
```

## Chapter title dot colors

For each of the following color: "`orange-red`", "`golden-yellow`", "`olive-green`", "`teal`", "`plum`", "`periwinkle`", "`steel-blue`", you just have to prefix it with "`.dot-`" and it will set the color as follow:

::: {.chapter-title .dot-plum}
.dot-plum
:::

::: {.chapter-title .dot-plum-600}
.dot-plum-600
:::

::: {.chapter-title .dot-plum-200}
.dot-plum-200
:::

::: {.chapter-title .dot-plum-400}
.dot-plum-400
:::

::: {.chapter-title .dot-orange-red}
.dot-orange-red
:::

::: {.chapter-title .dot-orange-red-600}
.dot-orange-red-600
:::

::: {.chapter-title .dot-orange-red-200}
.dot-orange-red-200
:::

::: {.chapter-title .dot-orange-red-400}
.dot-orange-red-400
:::

And so on.

> Note that `.dot-red`, `.dot-green` and `.dot-purple` also work, but it's recommended to use the previous names instead.

## Full Page Section Breaks

The pages below are full page section breaks. Take a look at the code to see how they are created.

```{r}
omni::omni_page_break("One Page Break", "yellow")
```

```{r}
omni::omni_page_break("Another Page Break", "teal")
```

```{r}
omni::omni_page_break("Here's another one", "orangered")
```

```{r}
omni::omni_page_break(
    "Long title using the olive color, that automatically goes to next line.",
    "olive"
)
```


```{r}
omni::omni_page_break(
    "One more teal background One more teal background",
    "teal",
    nmbr_pattern = 2
)
```

```{r}
omni::omni_page_break("Almost done", "periwinkle")
```

omni::omni_page_break("And the last one", "plum")
